Pre-Game Insights: Portland Trail Blazers and Memphis Grizzlies are set to face off in a Western Conference matchup on November 11, 2024.
Portland Trail Blazers finished the previous season with a 21-61 record and averaged 106.4 points per game.
Memphis Grizzlies finished the previous season with a 27-55 record and averaged 105.8 points per game.
Key players out for the Trail Blazers include Matisse Thybulle (knee).
Key players out for the Grizzlies include Desmond Bane (oblique), Vince Williams Jr. (leg), Ja Morant (hip), Marcus Smart (ankle), GG Jackson II (foot), and Cam Spencer (ankle).
